rComments: Kool guy. Interesting lectures (tho I did fall asleep often). He's a pretty funny guy. Class relied too much on the book though. And it's a lot harder than you would expect of a video game class - there's lots of memorization for the midterms. However, if you do alll the readings and attend lectures everyday, you should be just fine.

I took this class because I love video games. We covered a lot of material, maybe too much! Challenging class and awesome professor made it fun and interesting. Not an easy class, but if you attend and do the work you will do well.

Craig is awesome. he really has an interest in the subject area and encourages students to email him about games they are interested in to discuss them/potentially bring them up in class. he relies a lot on the book, which can be dense at times, but if you go to class you're pretty set for midterms/finals. he's also a pretty fine gentleman.

Pretty easy class if you take notes. Relies on the book a lot. He doesn't seem all that interested during lectures. Mandatory attendance. If you approach him he will help out a lot, but in big lectures he is kind of incomprehensible.
